sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zài zuò wǒ de yèwù.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于业务繁忙，我没时间去看电影。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於業務繁忙，我沒時間去看電影。
sentences.pinyin: Yóuyú yèwù fánmáng, wǒ méi shíjiān qù kàn diànyǐng.
sentences.translation: Due to my busy business, I don't have time to watch movies.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yào zhǎo yīgè jiājiào yèwù.
sentences.translation: I want to find a tutoring service.

sentences.simplifiedText: 根据业务的复杂性和关键程度，你可以决定是否需要专门的业务队伍去处理。
sentences.traditionalText: 根據業務的複雜性和關鍵程度，你可以決定是否需要專門的業務隊伍去處理。
sentences.pinyin: Gēnjù yèwù de fùzáxìng hé guānjiàn chéngdù, nǐ kěyǐ juédìng shìfǒu xūyào zhuānmén de yèwù duìwǔ qù chǔlǐ.
sentences.translation: Based on the complexity and criticality of the service, you can decide whether you need a specialized service team to handle it.
